location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Shiraz, to the Commanders of Any of the Honourable Company's Cruisers Proceeding to India

mods.abstract: Letter requests a passage to India on behalf of Lieutenant Robert Taylor and a Persian officer who bears a letter from the King of Persia [Fat'h Ali Shah Qajar] to the Governor General.
